articles.author: TOI Business Desk
articles.title: Tesla shake-up: Who is Omead Afshar? Senior executive reportedly fired by Elon Musk amid slumping sales i - Times of India
articles.description: International Business News: Omead Afshar, a key aide to Elon Musk and Tesla's VP of Manufacturing, is now out of job. This happened amidst Tesla facing sales challenges in North
